name: about-me
description: Single page website that has info about me.

scripts.prestart: npm run clean && npm run build:initial
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run watch:copy:files" "npm run watch:sass" "npm run watch:ts" "npm run serve"
scripts.build:initial: npm run copy:files && npm run build:sass:dev && npm run build:ts
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:files && npm run build:sass:prod && npm run build:ts
scripts.serve: browser-sync start --server dist --files 'index.html, style.css, index.js, assets/**/*'
